definition: printing block/section (of a newspaper)/board (of BBS or discussion forum)
lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units

sentences.english: And new data on that record tell a disturbing story, especially in the northeastern Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 和新的记录着关于东北面太平洋版块波动的数据。

sentences.english: Among sectors contributing to the positive European tone were oil and mining stocks.
sentences.chinese: 其他版块中，原油和煤炭版块在欧洲股市中涨幅居前。

sentences.english: Among sectors contributing to the positive European tone were oil and mining stocks.
sentences.chinese: 其他版块中，原油和煤炭版块在欧洲股市中涨幅居前。

sentences.english: Several blocks on rollers contain exhibits devoted to different topics.
sentences.chinese: 一些包含滚轮的版块展示了不同的主题。

sentences.english: This forum has recently made loud noise all the genre so much adware thing?
sentences.chinese: 最近这个版块大家咋发这么多广告软文类的东西？

sentences.english: Pansy asked which sections they would have.
sentences.chinese: 潘姿询问都会有哪些版块。

sentences.english: The green block is gonna become a pair of parentheses.
sentences.chinese: 只需要把绿色版块换成一对圆括号就可以了。

sentences.english: Mountains and valleys emerge and disappear due to plate tectonics.
sentences.chinese: 因为版块构造，山川与河流显现。

definition: slab/(geology) tectonic plate/(fig.) sector (of the stock market or of industry)/(economic) bloc
regular column or segment (in a publication or broadcast program)/program (TV or radio)
Toutiao, personalized content recommendation app (abbr. for 今日頭條|今日头条[Jin1 ri4 Tou2 tiao2])
